table: Any number of parameters is valid, including none
Device status report (DSR) requests cursor position, returned as Cursor position report (CPR): ESC [ r;c R

Set screen mode (SM)


0 = 40x25 monochrome text
1 = 40x25 color text
2 = 80x25 monochrome text
3 = 80x25 color text
4 = 320x200 color graphics
5 = 320x200 monochrome graphics
6 = 640x200 monochrome graphics
7 = wrap at end of line
13 = 320x200 color (graphics)
14 = 640x200 color (16-color graphics)
15 = 640x350 monochrome (2-color graphics)
16 = 640x350 color (16-color graphics)
17 = 640x480 monochrome (2-color graphics)
18 = 640x480 color (16-color graphics)
19 = 320x200 color (256-color graphics)
114 = 640x480 color (16-color graphics) (Japanese DOS/V)
115 = 640x475 color (16-color graphics) (Japanese DOS/V)
Set screen mode (SM) (Japanese versions, for special modes specific to platform)
Reset screen mode (RM) (Japanese versions, for special modes specific to platform)
Switch keyboard input mode to Korean (Hangul) (Korean MS-DOS only)
Switch keyboard input mode to English

1: key to remap
:2: key to remap to
